title: Il Drama di Cristo
creator_credit: Enrico Gras, Luciano Emmer and Colonna Film
brief_description: A study of the frescoes of Giotto (1267-1337) in the Sorovegni Chapel, Padua, of four of the most human and dramatic episodes in the life of Christ: the Nativity, the Massacre of the Innocents, Judas’ betrayal and the Crucifixion.
